comprehensive_overview: ZLUDA is a CUDA driver and runtime API compatibility layer for AMD GPUs, allowing CUDA applications to run on AMD hardware.
core_features: 1. Provides CUDA driver and runtime API compatibility for AMD GPUs. 2. Enables CUDA applications to run seamlessly on AMD hardware. 3. Supports a wide range of CUDA features and functionalities. 4. Optimizes performance for CUDA workloads on AMD GPUs.
